description:
Keita and his Farfetch`d are Pokémon theifs. Keita would use his Farfetch`d as a distraction and then Keita would swap his victims backpack with a duplicate fills with small rocks.
When Keita was caught he says the reason he steals Pokémon was because he thought his Farfetch`d was too weak to battle Pokémon normally.
After discovering his Farfetch`d is quite strong after a battle with Ash he returns all the backpacks and begins a journey as a Pokémon Trainer.
name: Keita
